title: (x) The Spy With A Cold Nose movie title - Futura Black {Dav, Marc O, Yves}
content:
hi could someone help me identify this font  
it's used on the cover of the score from that film  
i've seen it in other places but they used it here too  
the movie title is The Spy With A Cold Nose if that might help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC04180.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC04180.gif) | 12.8 KB |
author: heyzuppals

comments.content: oh i forgot and if anyone knows a version of that type but condensed, excuse my bad english, thanks

Futura Black, the oddball stencil member of the Futura family:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/futura-black-sb/regular/testd...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/futura-black-sb/regular/testdrive.html?s=THE+SPY+WITH+A+COLD+NOSE&p=36 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/futura-black-sb/regular/testdrive.html?s=THE+SPY+WITH+A+COLD+NOSE&p=36")

That would be the very un-Futura-like [Futura Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.107597.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=THE+SPY+WITH+A+COLD+NOSE&sampleSize=32). I don't think there's a condensed version available.

yeh well, but like a similar bold font, with negative lines between the letter and the bold body, but in an condensed font, it doesnt have to be the futura black, but some suggestion if there's avalaible  
tanx for replying

Something close to condensed Futura Black? I can't really think of anything. Possible suggestions: Larabie's [President Gas](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/president-gas/president-gas/testdrive.html?s=THE+SPY+WHO+CAME+IN+FROM+THE+NOSE&p=36) and Rian Hughes' [Flak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/flak/regular/testdrive.html?s=THE+SPY+WHO+CAME+IN+FROM+THE+NOSE&p=48).

P22 [Albers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/albers/)™  
Another Ray Larabie design [Threefortysixbarrel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/threefortysixbarrel/)  
 [Sten](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/sten/) by James Arboghast  
and [Gridiot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020164225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/incipit/gridiot/) by Peter Bain

-----------------------------------------  
Yes, I'm old, but I'm back in style!
